original_text: God said to the woman, ‘I will cause you to have great pain when you give birth to children. You will want to please your husband. But he will rule over you as your master.’
korean_text: 또 여자에게 이르시되 내가 네게 임신하는 고통을 크게 더하리니 네가 수고하고 자식을 낳을 것이며 너는 남편을 원하고 남편은 너를 다스릴 것이니라 하시고

sentences.original_text: I will cause you to have great pain
when you give birth to children
You will want to please your husband
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 너의 남편을 기쁘게 하고 싶을 것이다

sentences.original_text: But he will rule over you
